title: Beef and Broccolli
description: Beef and broccoli is a popular and easy Chinese takeout dish. In this video, you will learn techniques to ensure your broccoli stays fresh and your beef turns out juicy and tender. Letâ€™s get right into it.
overview: A popular and easy Chinese takeout dish featuring tender beef and crisp broccoli.

stages.title: PREP INGREDIENTS
content: Slice your beef into thin pieces.
Marinate with 1 tbsp Chinese cooking wine, light soy sauce, cornstarch, pepper, and baking soda.

stages.title: MAKE SAUCE
content: Mix together the sauce ingredients until the sugar is dissolved.

stages.title: COOK the Broccoli
content: Blanch in boiling water for 1-2 minutes.
Shock in ice water for 3-5 minutes to stop cooking.

stages.title: Stir Fry
content: Heat about 1 tbsp oil in a wok.
Add beef and fry for 15-20 seconds per side until browned.
Remove beef; in the same wok, stir fry garlic for a few seconds.
Pour in the sauce, then add broccoli and return beef to the wok. Toss to combine.
